synopsis.text: Bleu's public relations strategy, Team Pied Piper is dispatched to participate in a vibrant Swiss festival. Amidst the preparations, Fleur and Elena persuade a reluctant Ao to don female attire, revealing an uncanny resemblance to his mother. As the trio attempts to elude a persistent journalist, an urgent call redirects them to a critical mission at the Italian border, where a mysterious Secret has emerged. This original video anime unfolds between the events of episodes eight and nine in the Eureka Seven AO series and is released as a hybrid Blu-ray disc, featuring both the anime and a PlayStation 3 game.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
